oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Smoky Mountains Hiking Club spending the night under a big rock on the way to Mount Chapman. Front left to right, Walter Berry and Albert Gordon "Dutch" Roth. Back L to R: Argus Trerider, Harvey Broome, W. W. Stanley, Brockway Crouch, and Carlos Campbell."
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph taken with a 3A Autographic Kodak folding camera.
